text: Ronald E. Braunstein2017 Brier Media Guide: Previous Rosters (born c. 1940) is a Canadian retired curler. He played as second on Team Manitoba (skipped by his brother Terry Braunstein) and won the 1965 Brier. Ron was a medical student at the time and had to miss the World championships that year. He was replaced on the team by Gordon McTavish. ==References== Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:Brier champions Category:Jewish Canadian sportspeople Category:Sportspeople from Winnipeg Category:Canadian male curlers Category:1940s births Category:Living people
title: Ron Braunstein (curler)
